about_the_game:
A hell of horrific screams and steam...

This is where four unforgivable evildoers are dropped.

Gin Hendrick, a rogue cop who built a track record by getting false confessions and dabbled in the drug business.

Helena Grouse, a vice captain who nurtures the Grouse Family mafia organization and kills anyone who gets in her way.

Jack Beefeater, a psychopathic hitman who gets his kicks not from the money, but from the killing itself.

The Duke of Blanton, a corrupt royal who gets high on women, drugs, and kills prostitutes.

Lucifer's sweet temptation in front of four people from different backgrounds.

“Whoever reaches the end of my infernal castle.

I will grant him one wish.”

To escape this horrific place, the four embark on a race of atonement to escape this horrible place.

Project: HellPunk - A retro gore-speed action roguelite game

Project: HellPunk is a gory visual action roguelite game set in a steampunk hell. Blast your way through the horrific residents of Hell in an intense action to reach the final chamber where Lucifer resides.

Hell

In the year 18XX, Hell is no longer a barbaric place.

After mining helmantium, a mineral with endless possibilities, Hell has made remarkable progress.

Leisure gives way to pleasure, and revival gives way to hubris.

Lucifer, the ruler of Hell, has an interesting idea.

Wanting to feel a little closer and more alive as the humans who have fallen to Hell struggle to survive, he organizes a gaming venue for the wicked.

The Train

After being involved in a train accident, the main characters wake up to find themselves in a strange, steamy place.

Once aboard Lucifer's train, you can undergo body modifications that will give you new powers and allow you to try again.

Along the way, you'll meet an eclectic group of humanoid figures who may grant you favors, bitterly refuse them, or viciously crush your hopes.

Side-scrolling platformer action roguelite game

Project: HellPunk is a platformer action roguelike with new maps and enemy compositions every time.

Blood splattering, flesh falling gore action

Experience the epitome of gore and grotesqueness as limbs are ripped off and blown away with every monster you kill.

Blast your way through enemies and reach the end of Lucifer's hellish castle.

Customize your build with a variety of gears

Defeating monsters has a chance to drop gear. With a total of 72 gears with different effects and rarities, you can customize your build.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains many gory depictions and grotesque designs, including dismemberment, torture, and blood.

name: Project: HellPunk

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II X2 550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 520, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7470, 1 GB or Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-550 or AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710, 1 GB or AMD Radeon R7 240, 1 GB or Intel HD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria
